channel.title: Wotf on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Wotf on Adam Israel

item.title: Writers of the Future: Honorable Mention
item.description: I felt a little blue this week, grousing over revisions and my sometimes fragile ego. I distracted myself by patiently refreshing the Writers of the Future blog and checking the mail every few minutes, hoping to see some word of the 2009 Q4 results. Well, the list of Honorable Mentions was released before they had a chance to update the blog. “Out of the thousands of stories that get submitted to the contest, a small percentage make it this far,” Wentworth continued.
